activities.name: Check if TotalCustomer is GreaterThan Threshold Value

source.sqlReaderQuery: select count(*) AS TotalCustomer from saleslt.Customer
select  COUNT(*) AS ProductCount from SALESLT.Product
SELECT MAX(MODIFIEDdATE) AS LastUpdatedTime FROM SALESLT.CUSTOMER

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from saleslt.customer where modifieddate > '@{activity('Get HighWaterMark').output.firstRow.prop_0}'and modifieddate <= '@{activity('LAst Update From DB').output.firstRow.LastUpdatedTime}'

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalCount from SalesLT.Customer
select hw_date from HW_Table WHERE TableName ='Customer'
select max(ModifiedDate) AS LastModifiedDate from saleslt.customer

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from saleslt.Customer WHERE modifieddate > '@{activity('Get HW_DATE').output.firstRow.HW_Date}' and modifieddate <= '@{activity('Get Customer_lastModifiedDate').output.firstRow.LastModifiedDate}'
